faq.title: FAQ
faq.heading: Common questions
faq.subheading: Quick answers about browsing, location, and payments.
faq.q1: Do I need an account to browse vendors?
faq.a1: You can browse stores without signing in. An account is needed for placing orders.
faq.a2: We use your device location to estimate distance. If you deny permission, you can still browse with the default city.
faq.a3: Payments happen at pickup. Vendors can accept UPI or cash.
faq.q4: What if a moving stall changes location?
faq.a4: Vendors can update their live location in seconds from the dashboard.
